pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION
pluginstrument.description:
CJ4 Climate Control Switch See here for contact info and notes: https://github.com/simstrumentation
THIS INSTRUMENT IS ONLY DESIGNED TO WORK USING THE WORKING TITLE CJ4 MOD FOR MSFS2020.
White some functions may work with the default C4 included in MSFS, you must use the Working Title mod for full functionality.
Ambient back lighting is only supported while using the SIMSTRUMENTATON Ambient Light Dimmer control.
